name: metacritic100
description: An API and React app served by Express

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cd client && pnpm run build && cd .. && docker build -t metacritic100 . && docker run -p 3000:3000 --env-file .env -e EXPRESS_ENV=build --rm --name express-react-container metacritic100
scripts.deploy: cd ops && node checkVariables && cd .. && tsc -p tsconfig.json && cd client && pnpm run build:production && cd .. && fly deploy $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs -I {} echo '-e {}')

author: Dan Edwards
